name: Yuri The Greedy Spaceman
description:
This page is subject to change as I'm currently too tired to refine it.

Yuri is a spaceman. More specifically he's a greedy spaceman. He travels the galaxy looking for loot, sadly he's not the buffest person in the world and the more loot he has the harder he is to control. The goal of the game is simple: grab all the loot in the level without dying.

Created for the 40th Ludum Dare, theme: The More You Have The Worse It Is.
